Paragraph: As more TPD was introduced into the polymer backbone , the domain spacing of P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 gradually increased from 19.2 , 20.1 , 21.9 , 22.7 to 24.1 Å , respectively.

| P7 |

After reviewing the paragraph again, I still find that all of the entities I identified earlier, TPD, P1, P3, P4, P5, and P7, clearly refer to "Material Name" entities. They are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
